channel.title: Changing currency
channel.description:
I need help changing like the currency, i am working on a barrows shop, i set up everything, and then i go to buy a barrows peice from the shop and i press value and it says 0 points, then i press buy 1, i cant buy it at all, there are 100 in stock of each peice, but thats not what i want, i want it to be instead of 0 points to be gp like 20M gp, and then i can buy it...any ideas? im using Project Insanity (Exion)
Help would be greatly appreciated, and dont tell me to use Search, theres nothing on changing this!

item.title: Changing currency
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

There in the points shop, put them into a normal one?

Read full topic
